config.auto-sleep.name: Auto-Clear at Sleep
config.auto-sleep.description: Automatically purges the texture cache when the day ends.
config.frequency.name: Sleep Purge Frequency (Days)
config.frequency.description: How often to run the sleep purge. Set to 1 for every night. Increase this number (e.g. 3) if the end-of-day freeze bothers you.
config.sleep-ram-min.name: Min RAM to Purge (MB)
config.sleep-ram-min.description:
Only run the sleep purge if RAM usage is HIGHER than this. 
Default: 3072 (3GB). 
This prevents unnecessary freezing if your game memory is doing fine.
config.manual-key.name: Manual Purge Key
config.manual-key.description: The key to press to manually clear the image cache. Useful for fixing visual glitches.
config.force-gc.name: Aggressive Memory Clean
config.force-gc.description:
Forces the computer to free RAM immediately. 
Disable this if your game crashes with an 'AccessViolation' error.
config.ram-enable.name: Enable Active RAM Limit - Disable this if you use 'Stardew Stabilizer'
config.ram-enable.description: If enabled, the mod will clear the cache while playing if RAM gets too high (CAUTION: Causes freeze).
config.ram-value.name: Active RAM Limit (MB)
config.ram-value.description: The RAM usage limit in MB that triggers an emergency purge while playing.
